dmca.title: Battery-Biz complains of database copying
dmca.body: [KGSI reports that the referenced injunction has been dissolved.] Dear [private] Following up on my October 19, 2005 letter (copy enclosed), Battery-Biz has learned that KGSI registered the domain name Batterysavings.biz on October 25, 2005 (after the court's October 6, 2005 preliminary injunction was issued) and that Google is now referring and linking users to this mirror site. The Batterysavings.biz website simply refers people to the Batterysavings.com website. And through Batterysavings.biz, the infringement complained of in my prior letter is continuing. Battery-Biz has also discovered that the Batterysavings.com website is still appearing on Google searches in sponsored links despite your November 8, 2005 email which stated that these links were removed. Battery-Biz respectfully requests that pursuant to the DMCA and specifically, 17 U.S.C.
